history.content:
Thank you to those who were able to attend our Town Hall-style Undergraduate Social Hour on 1/31. We appreciate hearing about your experiences and your feedback. 

 
To continue the conversation, please join us at the next undergraduate social hour on 2/28 at 3:30pm in the Wozniak Lounge. We will discuss undergraduate elitism and the interactions between EECS and L&S CS majors. Last time, we heard several comments from students about the negative impact of elitist attitudes and behavior. This conversation will focus on ideas and strategies for improving the current climate, facilitated by Professor John DeNero.

Save the date for future social hours, where we plan to discuss other specific topics raised during the Undergraduate Town Hall (including diversity and civility/community building): 3/21, 4/25, 5/4 at the same time, 3:30-4:30pm. 
 
For those who were unable to attend, we are including minutes from the 1/31 event
history.subject: Follow up from Town Hall and Next Event: 2/28, 3:30pm
